name: 10 Sec Hero
description:
Use Z/X/C to use items and Arrow Keys to move to make your way throw this fast pace land of insanity.
Your looted items can be used by the next adventurers.

when you're in a battle room (red tile with a sword) you can't move until you beat the monster. You can attack it using the equiped items, using the Z/X/C key. For instance at the beginning you can use Z to attack with Bare Hand.

Go luck

Ludum Dare link
